name: Multi-Column Hubzilla Stream
description:
Multi-column Hubzilla network stream lets you browse through a lot more content more quickly.

Default is 2 columns, but you can change it to 3 or 4 columns by changing 50% to 33% or 25%.
additional_info: This style also auto-expands all posts, which reduces how much clicking you need to do, as well as making the UI less jumpy.
